title: WindHorse Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Breakfast and lunch restaurant serving American fare. Vegans have 2 choices: a veggie burger (pattie of whole grain rice, beets, black beans) and a sub sandwich with the usual veggies and hummus. At times a pasta specials without meat. Sources organic fruits and vegetables from local farmers. Informal atmosphere. Hosts meditation (Shambhala Buddhist) and Iyengar yoga classes .
